text.emotional: Time to rewatch the movie. I told David about it, but he’s more of a fan of the new ones. [disgust, low]Says, they’re more relatable[/disgust]. [happiness, low]Oh David, honey…[/happiness]
text.silence: {.} time to rewatch the movie {....} i told david about it but he's more of a fan of the new ones {..} says they're more relatable {....} oh {...} david honey {....}
